Title: About Police Station Agent | Expert Criminal Defence Solicitors Kent
H1: Specialist Police Station Representative Agency
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025About Police Station AgentSpecialist Police Station Representative AgencyExpert criminal defence representation at Kent police stations, providing qualified solicitors and accredited representatives at short noticeWho We ArePolice Station Agent is a specialist agency providing qualified criminal solicitors and accredited police station representatives to assist clients during police interviews under caution across Kent.Through our professional association with Tuckers Solicito

Title: Can We Help You? | Interactive Guide | Police Station Agent
H1: Can We Help You?
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Interactive GuideCan We Help You?Follow the flowchart below to see if our services are the right fit for your situation. Before You ProceedInstruction: We can only act if instructed by the detainee directly, or by a third party (family/friend) provided the detainee confirms they wish to instruct us upon our arrival [1].Existing Representation: We cannot obtain information from the police if the detainee has already instructed another solicitor or requested the Duty Solicitor.

Title: Detained Outside Kent? What To Do | Police Station Agent
H1: Detained Outside Kent?
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025National AssistanceDetained Outside Kent?While our primary agents are based in Kent, we can still assist you in the surrounding areas (e.g. London, Sussex). Here is what you need to do if the arrest has taken place outside of our immediate area.For Members of the PublicIf your friend or relative is detained outside KentWe Can Help If You Are Nearby.If the arrest is outside of Kent (e.g. London, Sussex, Surrey), we can still instruct Defence Legal Services to represent the deta

H1: Legal Insights & Advice

Title: Police Station Representation Services Kent | Free Legal Aid | 24/7
H1: Police Station Advice & Representation
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Police Station Advice & RepresentationExpert legal support during police investigations with seamless court coverage when needed. We specialise in police station representation because this is where cases are won or lost.Not sure which service you need? Try our interactive guide Legal Aid: Free RepresentationEveryone is entitled to free legal advice at the police station. This is a right, not a privilege, and is not means-tested. We can provide this service free of charge.Unde

Title: Refusing a Police Interview ‚Äì Pros & Cons | Expert Advice
H1: Refusing a Police Interview: Pros & Cons
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Refusing a Police Interview: Pros & ConsCan you just say "No"? Understanding your rights and the risks.Can I Refuse to Be Interviewed?Technically, you cannot be forced to speak. However, refusing to come out of your cell or refusing to sit in the interview room can lead to "adverse inferences" being drawn against you later in court. Crucial DistinctionThere is a difference between refusing to attend an interview and answering "No Comment" during an interview. Answering Questio

Title: Police Interview Help | Expert Legal Advice | Police Station Agent
H1: Police Interview Help Guide
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Police Interview Help GuideWhat you need to know BEFORE you step into the interview room. The Golden RuleYou have the right to free legal advice. Use it. The police are trained investigators. Having a solicitor does not make you look guilty; it ensures you are treated fairly and your rights are protected.Call for AdviceRead Full Guide What is a Voluntary Interview?Also known as a "caution + 3", this is a formal police interview but you are not under arrest.Legal advice is stil

Title: What Happens If I Ignore A Police Interview Invitation? | Legal Consequences
H1: What Happens If I Ignore A Police Interview Invitation?
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Critical Legal AdviceWhat Happens If I Ignore A Police Interview Invitation?Ignoring a voluntary police interview can have serious consequences. Here's what you need to know. Call Now: 01732 247 427 Text: 07535 494446CRITICAL: Don't Ignore Police ContactIf police have asked you to attend a voluntary interview, ignoring the invitation will NOT make the problem go away. It can make your situation significantly worse.What Can Happen If You Ignore The Invitation1. Police Can Arres

Title: Urgent Police Station Help | Has Someone Been Arrested? | 24/7 Free Advice
H1: HAS SOMEONE YOU KNOW BEEN ARRESTED?
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025 Emergency ResponseHAS SOMEONE YOU KNOW BEEN ARRESTED?Why You Are Reading This (And They Aren't)When someone is arrested, their mobile phone is immediately seized by police. They cannot search for a lawyer themselves.It is up to you (family or friend) to instruct a solicitor for them.Your Right to Help (PACE Code C, Para 6.15)"If a solicitor has been contacted by a third party (friend/relative) on the detainee's behalf... the detainee must be informed."Call our 24/7 Emergency

Title: Free Legal Advice at Police Station | Legal Aid Explained
H1: Yes, It Is Free.
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Yes, It Is Free.Everyone suspects, regardless of income or wealth, is entitled to free independent legal advice at the police station. No Bill To YouOur fees for police station attendance are paid directly by the Legal Aid Agency. You will never receive a bill from us for police station work. No Means TestUnlike court legal aid, police station advice is non-means tested. It doesn't matter if you are employed, unemployed, or a millionaire.Why Risk Going Without?Since it costs y

Title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions | Police Station Agent
H1: Everything You Need to Know
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Frequently Asked QuestionsEverything You Need to KnowComprehensive answers about our police station representation services across Kent Emergency: 01732 247 427Contact UsWhat We DoWhat services do Police Station Agent provide?Who do you represent?What types of offences do you cover?Do you cover voluntary police interviews?What qualifications do your representatives have?Are you available 24/7?Do you cover Legal Aid and private work?Which police stations do you cover?What We Do

Title: Voluntary Police Interview Solicitor | Police Station Agent
H1: Voluntary Police Interviews
Body: v4.4.0 ‚Äî 12/12/2025Your Rights MatterVoluntary Police InterviewsBeing "invited" for a police interview is just as serious as an arrest. Protect your rights with expert legal representation.Warning: A Voluntary Interview is Not an Informal ChatAnything you say in a voluntary interview is recorded and can be used as evidence against you. It is a formal interview under caution, and attending without a solicitor is a significant risk.Why You MUST Have a SolicitorIt's Free: Just like an interview und

Title: Website Terms of Use | Police Station Agent
H1: Website Terms of Use
Body: Legal AgreementWebsite Terms of UseLast updated: 12 December 2025 Application of These TermsThese terms apply to your use of this website (policestationagent.com) only. If you are a solicitor firm instructing us, please refer to our Agency Terms of Attendance.1. Information About UsPolice Station Agent is a trading name of Defence Legal Services Limited ("we", "us", "our").
